Translations.Text: Hav ni dekret them Vi ofert your viv Don up your hejm ili ne done gxi escept por a few da them! (Ecx such ordon issued hav ili done ki ili komand do gxi est bon them pruv strength their faith)
Kaj ni granted them great recompense
Kaj ni direkt them dekstr path
Those obe DI messenger aparten those ben DI! - prophets saints martyrs kaj des righteous. These est bon kompani
Such est ben el DI; DI est put Knower
O vi kred vi ceter vigl mobilize as individu mobilize all together
Surely tie est those vi tren their fut tiam setback aflikt vi ili dir DI ben me ke mi ne martyred them
Vi ating ben DI ili dir as se neni friendship ever ekzist vi them Mi wish mi est them mi akci such great victory
Those readily batal ig DI est those forsake this mond Hereafter Whoever batal ig DI tiam gets killed ating victory ni surely grant him great recompense
